This is the promenade finale piece. It has eight sections numbered 1(z) to 8 (,).

It will be conducted - and progress from section 1 through 8. The conducting gestures are:
* raised fist: stop
* raised number: prepare to play that number
* downward motion: play that number

There will be a slow steady beat - try and play your selected section starting on the beat
* sometimes you will be instructed to start playing on beat 2, 3, or 4
* you are free to stop playing your section at anytime.
* other than when you are conducted, you are free to start playing your section on any beat.
